question: An expert committee under which organization is constituted to probe into the monitoring of online activities of Indians by a Chinese Company?
explanation:
The central Government has constituted an expert committee under the National Cyber Security Coordinator.
The committee has been set up following reports that a Chinese technology company (Zhenhua Data Information Technology Company) was monitoring the online activity of over 10,000 prominent Indians. The committee has been given a time of 30 days to submit its findings.
